A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The director of this film clearly had no intention of adding to the star wars universe but instead wanted to make their own film with their own ideas. The amount of plot holes and non-linking random elements thrown just make this feel like a mess. Force Awakens did a good job of setting up a new new trilogy but Jedi uses no of these plot points well. Instead wanting to harp on about how being a hero is wrong.
